Got a fix for all you CloneP2P users out there. Use this torrent: https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6763843/Battlefield_3_Limited_Edition_MulTi_10_No_Crack
And only get the files from the root folder, (GDFBinary*, version.json, Engine.BuildInfo*) and these files from the Data folder (bom.fb2, initfs_Win32) and you are good to go once you launch the BF3 executable...

CLONEDVD P2P FIX!
Go to Update folder, then Patch, then Data. Copy file initfs_Win32 from Data to X:\BF3\Data\Win32.

Works!

ATTENTION CLONEDVD USERS: Ok so I followed these instructions:http://pastebin.com/d8PjGz7B
That .Dude. gave us and had the issue with the menu screen not coming up. The problem for me, and for most of you probably is you applied the Registry Edit without downloading and installing the language file. THE LANGUAGE FILE IS NECESSARY! Otherwise there is no menu text for the game to load and you get a blank graphic menu screen. I know it's a big 1.1 gig DL, but DL the enLoc.rar and install it. It should fix that particular problem

@jarhead2012

Sorry mate we've got to do what we've got to do. If you've already DLed all the pieces from the pastebin link make sure you have executed the instruction in order. It really shouldn't take more than 10 mins. Also if you have copied the English language files into the battlefield 3/data/win32/loc folder, then all you have to do is do the registry edit. Make sure you execute the registry edit AFTER you place in the language files, even if you have already done it. It worked for me, and should fix the No menu problem. It doesn't however fix the broken key rebinding, as that is an issue on a different version than the one this is meant to fix. This is meant to fix the leaked Russian release. Cheers and GL.

@jarhead2012

Ah ok so to activate the english files you installed. Make a notepad file anywhere you want and put this text in it:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\Electronic Arts\Battlefield 3]
"Language"="English"
"Locale"="EN"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Electronic Arts\Battlefield 3]
"Language"="English"
"Locale"="EN"

Then save it as "bf3.reg" This will turn the notepad file into an auto registry edit file. After you save and close bf3.reg go to where you saved it and merely double click it. A confirmation box will come up, just hit ok. Close everything, and launch the game. You should be g2g. Cheers!

I found this out after a lot of bullshit. The only proper working crack is the 31.3 MB one. Remember: It's just the .exe file you have to replace. No bullshit patches/cracks/dlls.

Just replace with the right .exe file (31.3 MB), and rename the God damn folder from "Battlefield 3™" to only "Battlefield".

The game crashes only because of the ™ in the folder name. Some fucked up. Don't know why that is.
